definition: World Bank/abbr. for 世界銀行|世界银行[Shi4 jie4 Yin2 hang2]

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: China may soon make a big contribution to the bank's intellectual ranks.
sentences.chinese: 中国可能很快就会为世行的学者队伍作一个大贡献。

sentences.english: There was a "dangerous cosiness" between the bank and Kenya's government.
sentences.chinese: 世行与肯尼亚政府之间总有种暧昧的“危险的默契”。

sentences.english: The new US$100 million funding is subject to approval by the World Bank's Board of Directors.
sentences.chinese: 1亿美元追加资金需经世行董事会审批。

sentences.english: Bank scaling up efforts to support the creation of good jobs.
sentences.chinese: 世行正加大工作力度，支持创造好的就业岗位。

sentences.english: What is the Role for the Bank Group in a New Post-Crisis World?
sentences.chinese: 世行集团在危机后的新世界中发挥怎样的作用？

sentences.english: Bank recapitalization is a key element in the World Bank Group’s response to the global financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 充资是世行集团应对全球金融危机的一项主要举措。

sentences.english: The bank suggests that phasing out the household registration system would  encourage more people to move to the city.
sentences.chinese: 世行建议逐步取消户籍制度以鼓励更多人去城市。

sentences.english: Prohibit pasture and raise livestock is one of important device for maintaining the achievements made by the project.
sentences.chinese: 推行禁牧舍饲是保护世行项目治理成果的重要方法。

sentences.english: Later, the focus shifted to institutional strengthening and knowledge transfer.
sentences.chinese: 后来，世行工作重点逐步转向制度加强和知识转让。

sentences.english: Hundreds of governance and anti-corruption activities take place throughout the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: 世行开展了大量治理和反腐败工作。

sentences.english: For accessing printed versions of Bank documents, the Bank operates the InfoShop.
sentences.chinese: 为了提供印刷版文件，世行成立了信息处。

sentences.english: Reproductive health is an integral part of the Bank’s results-based financing work.
sentences.chinese: 生殖健康是世行基于成果的融资工作的有机组成部分。

sentences.english: The Bank worked in partnership with Mexico to develop the MultiCat Program.
sentences.chinese: 世行与墨西哥合作制定了“多巨灾计划”。

sentences.english: The Bank will be working to ensure its response is sensitive to the conflict dynamics of these regions" Cliffe says.
sentences.chinese: 世行将努力保证根据这些地区的冲突动态作出反应。

sentences.english: The Bank is preparing two rapid response operations in Djibouti and Yemen.
sentences.chinese: 世行正在吉布提和也门准备两个快速反应业务。

sentences.english: Information is drawn from Bank country teams and technical reports.
sentences.chinese: 这些信息来自世行国别项目组和技术报告。
